sen.j: 三野後国造（みののしりのくにみやつこ・みののしりのこくぞう）は美濃国東部を支配した国造。
sen.e: Minonoshirinokunimiyatsuko (also known as Minonosihrinokokuzo) was kuninomiyatsuko ruled the east of Mino Province.
Minonoshiri no kunimiyatsuko (also known as Minonosihrinokokuzo) was kuninomiyatsuko (local ruling families in ancient Japan) ruled the east of Mino Province.
sen.cmt: 表記変更local ruling families in ancient Japan を追加しました。
sen.e: Minonoshiri no kunimiyatsuko (also known as Minonosihrinokokuzo) was kuninomiyatsuko (local ruling families in ancient Japan) ruled the east of Mino Province.

sen.j: 『国造本紀』によると、出雲大臣命の孫の臣賀夫良命が成務天皇朝に三野後国造に任じられたという。
sen.e: According to "Kuninomiyatsuko hongi", Mononobenoominokaburanomikoto, a grandson of Izumonooomi, was appointed Minonoshirinokunimiyatsuko during the reign of Emperor Seimu.
According to "Kokuzo hongi," Mononobenoominokabura no mikoto, a grandson of Izumonooomi, was appointed Minonoshiri no kunimiyatsuko during the reign of Emperor Seimu.
sen.cmt: Kuninomiyatsuko→Kokuzo カンマの位置を調整
sen.e: According to "Kokuzo hongi," Mononobenoominokabura no mikoto, a grandson of Izumonooomi, was appointed Minonoshiri no kunimiyatsuko during the reign of Emperor Seimu.
The Minonoshiri clan.
The Minonoshiri clan.
The Minonoshiri clan.
Kabane was Atai.
Kabane was Atai.
Kabane was Atai.
The clan was descended from the same line as the Mononobe clan.
The clan was descended from the same line as the Mononobe clan.
The clan was descended from the same line as the Mononobe clan.
The east part of Mino Province.
The east part of Mino Province.
The east part of Mino Province.

sen.j: 現在の岐阜県美濃地方東部。
sen.e: The east part of present Mino area in Gifu Prefecture.
The east part of present Mino area in Gifu Prefecture.
The east part of present Mino area in Gifu Prefecture.

sen.j: 後に三野前国造に追われたか。
sen.e: The clan was supposed to be driven out by Minonosakinokuninomiyatsuko later.
The clan was supposed to be driven out by Minonosaki no kuninomiyatsuko later.
The clan was supposed to be driven out by Minonosaki no kuninomiyatsuko later.
Unknown.
